繼續做野





TVB在反送中報導一事，已經嚴重違反電視通用業務守則中有關「第9章準確、持平及公正」，當中要求「持牌人必須盡一切合理努力，確保新聞、時事節目...的真實資料準確無誤」，以及「持牌人必須確保新聞節目...能夠恰當地持平」，「不可使用謬誤資料或歪曲事實。持牌人亦不應錯誤引導觀眾，以致對節目提及的人士或團體不公平」

TVB在反送中的報導完全扭曲事相，報導嚴重偏袒警方和政府，報導失實 ， 偏頗，例如6月12日的「六點半新聞報道」和「晚間新聞」，完全不播放及不提及：
1. 警方違法向多名記者開槍，棍打記者
2. 警方違法瞄準市民頭部發射布袋彈和橡膠子彈
3. 在沒有任何襲擊下，警方違法向婦孺、伯伯開槍
4. 警方違法向市民投擲鐵枝、磗頭
5. 隻字不提一些市民向警方掟水樽垃圾等之前，警方在多處在沒有受到任何襲擊，提出任何警告下，違法突然向市民開槍，不斷發射催淚彈，布袋彈和橡膠子彈，導致局勢快速失控
6.隻字不提有市民於6月15日於太古廣場因展示示威標語墮樓, 送院搶救後不治的事實

投訴表格：https://apps.coms-auth.hk/apps/broadcasting_complaint/index.aspx?lang=2


日期： 2019/6/12 時間1830 新聞報導

好撚驚呀
屌你老母劉文斌
推到佢比人炒
推到比人炒

做過研究生，講俾大家知個經驗

1，每個研究生有個 Supervisor，研究生嘅研究資助係由 Supervisor 出，直接 send 呢個大陸人嘅言論去佢個 Supervisor 嘅 Email。

2，Supervisor 所隸屬嘅 School, Department 或 Faculty 都好注重個 Supervisor 表現，又多個途徑 send Email。

3，每個 Teaching assistant 都要被評估，收到過低嘅評分要見 Board。

垃圾英文template，係其他post抄咗個開頭，大家幫手改一改

Dear Dean of Student,

I am writing to lodge a complaint regarding the insensitive comment about the anti-extradition law protest made by your employee Liu Wenbin, who is currently a teaching assistant and also a MPhil student of the Department of History, on his social media account.

Hong Kong is currently facing a critical moment and the protest is crucial in safeguarding the freedom and democracy of Hong Kong. Almost every Hongkonger is now going through blood, sweat and tears in fighting for a better society. Liu, however, made a very unprofessional and distasteful comment on his social media account, publicly showing grudges against the social movement and threatening to fail local students who joined the protest these few days in the coming semester. His remarks are now being circulated online, outraging thousands of netizens.

I am writing to ask you to look into these matters, take disciplinary action against Liu and review your employee‘s social media policy immediately. I would also like to seize this change to urge the school to prevent hiring non-local Chinese students as teaching assistants in the future. Ability in making academic achievements should never be the only thing to be value when the school is hiring employees and admitting students, no matter undergraduate or postgraduate, personal traits are also important. Especially for lecturers and postgraduate students who in many cases would become teaching assistants and could affect others’ academic results. With the threatening remarks made by Liu, I believe many fellow Hongkongers would doubt whether these non-local Chinese people are professional enough to create a fair environment and teach our students.

I look forward to hearing from you shortly.
Best Regards,

劉文斌 廈門大學歷史文學士 中大歷史mphil year1
題目：明代經濟 指導教授：卜永堅(卜生好野)
2018-2019學年sem 1擔任tutor課程：無
2018-2019學年sem 2擔任tutor課程：HIST5574(Ma course) 講師：鄧聰 (佢只係掛名Ta，實質做助教野都係蕭生蕭錦華，佢都係行行企企)

好啦你可能會問點解條仆街會無Ta workload咁濟，因為條友話自己唔識廣東話同英文差，但係好多courses都用廣東話教，所以department第一個sem就唔洗佢做Ta，到第二個sem又求其加佢落個ma course度，乜都無做過仲好意思話肥學生，收皮啦。所以條垃圾大陸仔根本係貴族咁成年喺度9 fing，然後每個月白拎助學金，根本對其他研究生就好唔公平，今次仲要兇 local啲UG學生，真係火都黎，今次至少一定要學系扣佢studentship!
自己都肥埋啦
